tests.name: RBAC Authentication System
tests.details: Enhanced role-based access control with admin/editor/viewer roles implemented successfully

tests.name: Bearer Token Validation
tests.details: Bearer token authentication with database integration working correctly

tests.name: Onboarding Wizard Flow
tests.details: 4-step onboarding wizard with progress tracking and dummy integrations functional

tests.name: Topic to Draft Pipeline
tests.details: Content creation pipeline from topics to drafts working with proper metadata handling

tests.name: QA to Publish Pipeline
tests.details: Quality assurance validation and publishing workflow operational with stubbed integrations

tests.name: Rulebook QA Validation
tests.details: Content validation system checking heading hierarchy, keywords, meta tags, and links

tests.name: Integration Management
tests.details: Encrypted credential storage and dummy integration setup for WP, GSC, GA4, OpenAI, Perplexity

tests.name: Enhanced Observability
tests.details: Metrics collection with site counters, job tracking, and enhanced /api/ops/metrics endpoint

features.integrations: ✅ Encrypted credential storage with dummy support
features.frontend: ✅ Friendly SaaS UI with shadcn/ui components

notes: Phase 10 MVP successfully implements complete content management workflow with enterprise-grade security and user-friendly interface. All core requirements met and system ready for demonstration.
